metadata.title: Ahmad’s Laboratory
metadata.description: Ahmad Fauzan Bagaskoro’s main portfolio site.

aboutMe.title: About Me
content: My name is Ahmad Fauzan Bagaskoro. I go by Ahmad, Fauzan, Bagas, or Akira. I am an aspiring web developer. I am good with math and number, analytical thinking, and problem solving. I am detail-oriented, logical, and passionate about creating nice user interface and pleasant user experience in web-browsing, typography in website, and internationalization.
In my free time, I love listening to music. I am a fan of some Asian idol groups such as Arashi and Produce Pandas.

portfolio.title: Portfolios
explanations: Some portfolios that I have made. As I learn more and gain more experience, the number will keep increasing.

gyeeExcerpts.introductory: Excerpts from a role-playing mobile game application titled “GYEE”, translated to many languages by Google Translate.
